* Jerb Store Tests

  Put this in hello.jerb:
  #+BEGIN_EXAMPLE
  {"jid": "b01736e3d0d53d36387af67bc5cdbef78d1b7381", "meta": {"ref": "hello", "description": "", "parents": "", "tags": "", "user.email": "thorsoni@ohsu.edu", "user.name": "Ivar Thorson"}, "pack": "\n"}
  #+END_EXAMPLE

  Start up the server
  #+BEGIN_EXAMPLE
  cd ~/git/nems
  python -m jerbstore
  #+END_EXAMPLE

  In another terminal, send hello.jerb to localhost:
  #+BEGIN_EXAMPLE
  curl -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -X PUT --data @hello.jerb http://localhost:3000/jid/b01736e3d0d53d36387af67bc5cdbef78d1b7381
  #+END_EXAMPLE
  
  Finally, you should be able to query that jerb you just uploaded:
  #+BEGIN_EXAMPLE
  curl http://localhost:3000/jid/b01736e3d0d53d36387af67bc5cdbef78d1b7381
  #+END_EXAMPLE
